channel.title: How To Make A GIF Banner
channel.description:
[b]Hello Moparscapers.
I Am Fairly New To This Website So I Don't Realy Know If This Is The Right Place To Post This Question But. Does Anybody Know The Website Or Program You Need To Use To Make A GIF Banner, For Example Pwnscape's Banner That They Have That Like Flash's 40k Players, And 8 Training Area's And All That Stuff. I Would Be Very Greatful If You Could Tell Me.
Thank You Very Much.
- ッXx Wєєd™ xXッ[/B]
P.S. Sorry About My English If I Miss Spelt Something.

item.title: How To Make A GIF Banner
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

`Lewk_ speaks the truth, bold letters and title case typing is gay and harder to read, you cannot win because you’re typing incorrectly, try to learn to type normally and then we can all smile and be happy.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 27-12-2009, 17:21:10[/size][hr]I suppose this topic has no reason to be continued, locked.

P.S, I never really came to RSPS. I’m just around to annoy the fuck out of you idiots.
